Squizzy::

She looked out the chamber window with fuzzy vision.  She mumbled a 
bit because not all her functions were fully on line.  She shook her 
head a little and peered again out the chamber window. She said in 
avery soft, but slurred voice, "what's going on? Lemme out of here?"
She tried to move her hand to push it against the door, but could 
barely lift her arm.  She felt like she wasn't in control of 
herself.  She felt herself drifting back into sleep, but she didn't 
want to.  She tried to fight it, but eventually gave in and fell 
asleep in the chamber that Dark One had put her in.
